Posts.Content: Hello Shutzie thanks for tips i keep reading about crushed pineapple ha ha wondered what it was for!!!! Just want to get started , all this waiting for treatment not good , good luck with yr 2nd treatment how have u been ? Trudy
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey read your post im in similar situation found a lump went to GP 15th Aug ,had mammagram and ultrasound on the 22nd Aug the scan showed it was in my lymph nodes then had to have biopsy . Returned to see consultant 30th Aug i have invasive Ductal breast Camcer i have to have chemo first . Im still in shock cant still believe it.My next app is on 12th sept in oncology to disscuss treatment , not lookin forward to that bit. This site is great, very supportive this is my 1st post ive written, your right we have to stay strong and positive Trudy
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey im having my treatment at Derriford Hospital Plymouth i live near Tavistock.Ah your son is so young bless must be hard my boy is 22yrs but hes still my baby ha ha.My mum has been great, shes got enough on her plate my Dads very poorly with a diifferent cancer of his own not good ,but life goes on doesnt it .Keep in touch Trudy xx
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new here...

Posts.Content: Hi Abbey the waitng is the worst ,ive been in shock still cant blev it told my 19yr old daughter at the wkend not nice very emotional ,she was tottally stunned bless her!!!! My son who is 22yrs is in afganistan atm im not going 2 tell him yet he has enough on his plate to deal with . Its certainly going to be a roller coaste,r i have my husband Paul whos been my rock and family and friends who have been so supportive so will beat this Abbey, be strong this forum is fab like you said, glad i found it !!!!! Trudy xx

Posts.Content: Anyone suffered from cording after surgery ? I had surgery a month ago really suffering ATM doing excercises but not helping much !!!
